info.description:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/django-postgres-dropdb.svg?longCache=True)](https://pypi.org/project/django-postgres-dropdb/) #### Installation ```bash $ [sudo] pip install django-postgres-dropdb ``` #### Commands command|`help` -|- `python manage.py dropdb` |drop postgres database #### Executable modules usage|`__doc__` -|- `python -m django_postgres_dropdb [alias]` |drop postgres database #### Examples example 1 - management command: `settings.py` ```python INSTALLED_APPS+=['django_postgres_dropdb'] DATABASES = { 'default': { 'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.postgresql', 'NAME': os.getenv('DB_NAME'), 'USER': os.getenv('DB_USER'), 'PASSWORD': os.getenv('DB_PASS'), 'HOST': os.getenv('DB_HOST'), 'PORT': os.getenv('DB_PORT'), } } ``` ```bash $ python manage.py dropdb $ python manage.py dropdb "default" ``` example 2 - python module cli: `settings.py` ```python DATABASES = { 'default': { 'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.postgresql', 'NAME': os.getenv('DB_NAME'), 'USER': os.getenv('DB_USER'), 'PASSWORD': os.getenv('DB_PASS'), 'HOST': os.getenv('DB_HOST'), 'PORT': os.getenv('DB_PORT'), } } ``` ```bash $ export DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=settings $ python -m django_postgres_dropdb $ python -m django_postgres_dropdb "default" ``` #### Related projects + [django-postgres-createdb](https://pypi.org/project/django-postgres-createdb/) + [django-postgres-dropdb](https://pypi.org/project/django-postgres-dropdb/)

django-readme-generator
